title: Poolparty Skin with points... Worth or Not?
body:
Dear Riot.....
you had a great thought.... You give a skin to a player if he/her plays games or if he's/her's  friendly and gives his/her friends/rdm people from their games gifts.... Well.... the thaught was good.... But is it really worth?
I wanted to know how much it would cost if you get the skin with gifting ONLY! And did some calculations.....
1 Mistery Gift = 3.333333333333333 Euro (3.75883333333333295745 Dollar) and 1 Gift gives you 10 Points.... (calculated with 500RP instead of 490RP)
You need 55 000 000 Points  --> You have to send 5 500 000 Gifts
So.... 5 500 000 x 3.333333333333333 = 18333333.3333333315 (18 333 333.33 Euro)
Now the next thing.... I calculated with 500 instead of 490 (490 of 500 = 98%)
18 333 333.33 x 0.98 = 17966666.6634  -->  17 966 666.66 Euro
So you guys can decide..... Play 11 Million games as 5 premades or you pay 17 966 666.66 Euro to unlock the new Skin! :) GL&HF guys!

replies.body:
Mundo Skin = 975 RP = 6€  Icon = 2€ 4 Spiele IP Boost + 3 Tage IP Boost = 6 €
Allein schon 100000 Spieler * 6 = 600000€+ 2*100000 = 200000 €+ 4*100000=400000 + 2*100000 = 200000
6 Tausend + 2 Tausend + 2 Tausend +4 Tausen = 14 Tausend Euro. Ja klar sie machen dennoch Profit, aber müssen trz. auf Geld verzichten

You noted, that the community as a whole, can gather the points together? That means, every Fullpremadeteam per match generates points and every single mystery gift. Maybe I will now see the first time, that someone gives away a gift in the end game lobby. (I did it once to a friend, but that doesn´t really count)
